title: Popeye the Sailor Meets Sindbad the Sailor

sources.title: Popeye the Sailor Meets Sindbad the Sailor (1936) [Colorized, 4K, 60FPS
sources.description: Popeye the Sailor Meets Sindbad the Sailor is a 1936 black and white movie film which has been colorised, upscaled to 4K, and frames per second boosted to 60 FPS in 2021 using Artificial Intelligence (A.I) and Google Colab @  https://colab.research.google.com   Technologies used: A.I. Colorizing:  https://github.com/jantic/DeOldify  A.I. Increasing frame rate 60 FPS:  https://rife-vfi.github.io   A.I. Upscaling to 4K:  https://ffmpeg.org   GPU: Google Colab. This movie is in public domain category and it is Copyright free.

sources.title: Popeye the Sailor Meets Sindbad the Sailor (1936)
sources.description: Two sailors Sindbad and Popeye decide to test themselves in order to prove their supremacy. Popeye is then presented with a series of daunting tasks by Sindbad. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/popeye-the-sailor-meets-sindbad-the-sailor-1936/

metadata.Plot: After sending his giant bird, Rokh, to wreck Popeye's boat and kidnap Olive Oyl, Sindbad forces Olive to dance for him by firing buckshot at her feet with a pea-shooter. Popeye attempts to rescue her while J. Wellington Wimpy follows a duck around with a meat-grinder. After Popeye disposes of Rokh and Sindbad's two-headed, Yiddish-accented giant, Boola, it's a battle to the "finich" between the two legendary sailors.
metadata.Writer: Izzy Sparber, Joe Stultz, Bill Turner
metadata.Actors: Jack Mercer, Mae Questel, Lou Fleischer
metadata.Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. 1 win & 1 nomination total
